text: New York, NY Lead Front End Engineer @ Profitably.com We just raised $1.1M, and we are looking to bring on #7. Our third co-founder was UX & Visual Design. We couldn't take design more seriously, and we need someone that loves making design a js powered reality. We've got cash and equity for you if that's in your wheelhouse. Profitably is business analytics, simplified. Email me with questions, more on the job at: http://www.profitably.com/finance/careers/vp-interaction
